channel.title: Tutorial Watch - June
channel.description: This thread will be used to discuss any high-quality tutorials that are potential candidates for the "Best Tutorial(s) of the Month" section for the Mopar Monthly that will be published at the end of June. Notable points will be placed into the OP.

item.title: Tutorial Watch - June
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I agree, that is a good tutorial and it has my vote. Overall, though, I’m pretty disappointed with this month I’m tempted to make a tutorial just so we have non-arham tutorials haha.

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Watch - June
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Received a nomination earlier today for Clawz_Fury’s tutorial on Data Encapsulation and its Importance in RSPS Programming. Overall good tutorial, covers a lot of rather important points and the comments were positive for the most part.

Read full topic
